thread.title: Una Medina Olmsted
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Una Medina Olmsted

author: Una Medina Olmsted
title: Una Medina Olmsted
text:
CustomerCare responded immediately when a part was missing-- got it to us next morning.
Whenever I called with a question the Pelican people were polite and helpful.
The water is very tasty-- we are only in the second day of a 3-week conditioning process
Our old Water Heater and pipes are shedding scale and the water still has carbon dust in it as explained in the manual-- for a couple weeks, even though we soaked carbon tank for minimum 48 hours (actually longer than the minimum) then flushed it following instructions.
But it was explained in the manual. And the youtube video
Nevertheless, the water tastes wonderful, and we can taste dissolved minerals from softening scale, though that will lessen over the weeks. What's best is there's no chlorine in my bath water or in the toilets. No more chemical or putrid city water smells masked by chlorination.
We feel like we are at a hot mineral springs hotel right here at home.
